code: import axios from'axios';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:5000';export const createPost=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/newPost"),data);export const getPosts=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/allPosts"));export const supportPost=id=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/supportPost?id=").concat(id));export const notSupportPost=id=>axios.put("".concat(API_URL,"/notSupportPost?id=").concat(id));export const createContact=data=>axios.post("".concat(API_URL,"/newContact"),data);export const getContacts=()=>axios.get("".concat(API_URL,"/allContacts"));
